name: MathPuzzles
0:
”Alexa, open Math Puzzle”
”Ask me a math puzzle”
”Answer is 3”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math puzzle
des:
This Alexa skill is about enhancing and sharpening your ability to solve math puzzles. It aims to improve mathematics problem solving skill of people. It can even be played as a game. 

It works as: Alexa asks math puzzles which include questions on basic addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Example, Alexa will ask example, What is 1 + 2. The person can reapond back with: Answer is 3
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
